dialog.title: Wɔ xɔ yeye .

userId.label: Zãla ƒe ID .
userId.placeholder: Ŋlɔ zãla ƒe ID (le kpɔɖeŋu me: @user:example.com)

error.required: Zãla ƒe ID mate ŋu anɔ ƒuƒlu o .
error.invalid: Zãla ƒe ID ƒe nɔnɔme si mele eteƒe o .

roomName.label: Xɔa ƒe Ŋkɔ (wò ŋutɔe tiae) .
roomName.placeholder: Ŋlɔ xɔ ƒe ŋkɔ ɖe eme .

isEncrypted.label: Na nya ɣaɣlawo tsɔtsɔ ɣla tso nuwuwu vaseɖe nuwuwu nawɔ dɔ .

topic.label: Tanya (wò ŋutɔe tiae) .
topic.placeholder: Ge ɖe xɔa ƒe tanya me .

dialog.error: Vodada aɖe dzɔ esime wonɔ xɔ aɖe wɔm: {error}
